Detailed Description

A dynamic event loader and manager.

Loads and runs event functions from a python package.

Todo:
create a generate script function that creates temp scripts (which could be wrote to file on request)

def pnm.events.eventManager.EventManager.hook (   self,
  event,
  data = None 
)

Hook an event, if one exists.

This fires and event if it exists in the _scripts folder.

Parameters:
event - Event name.
data - Information to be sent to the event.

  delay,
  event,
  data = None

Hook an event after a given delay.

Parameters:

Returns:
True if the event was created
def pnm.events.eventManager.EventManager.indexEvents (   self,
  scriptDir = None 
)

Check and index event script files Searches through given script directory for event script files.

If the files are in the correct format they are added to the event list used by hook.

Parameters:
scriptDir - Script directory name. Important: This is not a path, only the name of the directory.
def pnm.events.eventManager.EventManager.update (   self,
  timeElapsed 
)

Process the delayed event list.

Parameters:
timeElapsed - The time passed since last update
